item.description:
Life's A Bead in Belmont at 404 Trapelo Road has a FREE Basic Beading Class every Friday from 1-2pm. You will learn how to make a necklace, bracelet or anklet and how to end it by crimping. You'll also learn about different beads, threads, stringing materials and what they're all used for. Supplies are not included just the free instruction.

If you're already a beader, check out the class schedule for some fabulous classes!
item.name: Want to learn how to make your own jewelry?
